nodes.text: Kiru Hali was a Sage of Uhnuhakka who was quoted as speaking about how all living things were bound together by the Force in Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force, a compilation of material relating to the Force compiled by the Disciple of the Whills Kozem Pel.
Kiru Hali was first mentioned as part of a chapter quote in the 2017 novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka.
